titleInfo.title: R U N A W A Y.

mods.abstract: R U N A W A Y . WAS committed to the jail of this parish a negro man named BOB, aged about 20 years; says he belongs to Wash. Tanner, on Bayou Maringouin, parish of Iberville; said slave is near 6 feet in height. The owner is requested to come forward, pay charges, and take him out of jail. M. AGUILLAR, Jailor. Pointe Coupee, March 12, 1359.

detail.title: Pointe Coupee Democrat. : (False River [i.e. New Roads], Parish of Pointe Coupee [La.]) 1858-1876

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
